p: (2) Oxygenated monoterpenoids: borneol, camphor, carvacrol, cis-carveol, trans-carveol, carvone, carvotanacetone, 1,8-cineole, cryptone, p-cymene-8-ol, p-cymene-8-methyl ether, dihydrocarveol, dihydrocarvone, linalool, cis- p-mentha-2,8-dien-1-ol, p-mentha-3,8-dien-1-ol, p-mentha-1(7),8-dien-1-ol, 1 (7)- p-menthadien-4-ol, p-mentha-1,8-dien-5-ol, p-mentha-1,8-dien-4-ol, cis-p-menth-2-en-1-ol, myrtenal, myrtenol, methyl carvacrol, trans-pinocarveol, pinocamphone, cis-sabinene hydrate, trans-sabinene hydrate, terpinen-4-ol, 1-terpinen-5-ol, α-terpeneol, phellandral, piperitone, citronellal, nerol, geraniol, isopinocamphone, methyl citronellate, methyl geranate, α-terpenyl acetate, terpenolene epoxide and trans-limonene epoxide.
